name: Red Genie: An Eidola Tale February Demo
name_original: Red Genie: An Eidola Tale February Demo
description:
This is the demo of my first full-size game, Red Genie: An Eidola Tale! This turn-based RPG follows the story of The Adventurer - a person who's on a quest to make a wish to set the world right. To do this, they seek a legendary artifact called the Red Genie.

-Combining old and new-school ideas, fight battles in turn-based action with a weapon swap system that allows The Adventurer to freely swap between up to 10 different weapon types during battle!

-Along with 200* weapons across all types and 150 armors and charms, master Magic and Techniques to utilize your arsenal at its highest levels! There's sure to be a build for you! Specialize in weapons or master the arcane - build The Adventurer to your preferences!

-Take part in the mystery of the story of the Red Genie and discover the truth in the full version due to release in April 2023!

This demo also has a survey linked in the Credits of the game in the Main Menu. If this game interests you or you see places for improvement, please fill out the survey! It will greatly assist further development and polishing in the coming weeks!

*Please note that all 200 weapons will not be available in the demo! It would be hard to fit them all in a short vertical slice like this!

This demo is of a work-in-progress build and is not the final product. The final game may differ greatly from this version and art assets are not final. Downloadable as a Zip file - make sure you extract it!
